comments:
If an "Additional Source Location" with "Search subfolders" enabled contains a
non-readable subfolder, file.listFiles() returns null.
This value is used as the input of Arrays.asList(), causing a
NullPointerException inside.

Location:
org.eclipse.cdt.debug.internal.core.sourcelookup.CDirectorySourceLocation.getFileFolders(CDirectorySourceLocation.java:515)

Suggested fix:
Add a check for (folder == null).
